entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
